Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 71st overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Dave Gurrola (STL)...
8/9/2015: Signed a contract extension with Colorado, $20,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 4/23/2018...
